description: Say hello to Ezra! The 21-year old has a well-muscled body with colorful tattoos and an ass that'll bring a tear to your eye. He weighs 165 lbs., is lean and has a really well-defined v-shaped back.He's visiting us out here from the North East, and he's loving it! He says he thought he'd give Active Duty a try, since he's thought doing porn was a 'pretty good option.' And who am I to disagree? Ezra says he wrestled back in high school, and I think it shows. Or maybe that's just me picturing myself pinned down beneath his chest. Well, regardless, it's clear that he's one fine specimen of physical fitness. You can tell that he works out every day -- his shoulders are massive! I mean, I haven't seen neck and shoulder muscles this large on someone -- as compared to the rest of their body -- in a long while.Can we also pause for a moment to talk about his oh-so-glorious ass? It's smooth. So smooth that we can see goosebumps on it. (I think I need to turn up the heat in the studio, eh?)Lucky for us, Ezra is fond of his hairless hole, and enjoys fingering and playing with it a bit throughout the video. He really gets into jerking off and putting on a show, and it eventually leads into an explosive orgasm. He says he'll 'definitely' come back and do this again, 'real soon.' Before we go, we get Ezra into the shower to clean up. Watching the water cascade down his body is something else. Dang!
title: Ezra
